# ESP32_Killer

This is a cool project inspired by a Instagram reel which i found great to make irl, it is capable of blocking all kind of devices that operate on wifi to deauthenticate ( disconnect ) along with blocking BT signal simultaneously along with Wi-Fi. 

## BOM 

1x [ESP-32 Module](https://www.bing.com/ck/a?!&&p=df6a1c49c3f3f53b7fe7d77ff725846d2b0ad985035e8e2d673586f70d44ce95JmdvaWQ9MzM3NTU0MDA3NjY5JmltdHM9MTc2NDg2NjQxMiZyZ3VpZD03ZTZmNDgwYy1hYzEzLTQ4MjctOWU2Yy04ZTI1NTc2Y2M2OTkmbWt0PWVuLWlu&ptn=2&hsh=4&fclid=e6f31c1a-d12f-11f0-a3e2-376a46a77086&&ntb=1) - $5

2x [nrf24L01 Antenna Modules ](https://www.bing.com/ck/a?!&&p=cd1ade76bc530801544db6ba4df714a36843773852f397651eed925e68455aeeJmdvaWQ9MTcyMzUxODM3MDQ4JmltdHM9MTc2NDg2NjQ5NSZyZ3VpZD0yNmNjZDhhYi00M2ZjLTQzOGQtYjZlOC0yNzE5NjJlZWM1MzUmbWt0PWVuLWlu&ptn=2&hsh=4&fclid=18b93560-d130-11f0-9228-08fba50b8948&&ntb=1) - $5

1x PCB Custom Made $20

1x [ Battery ](https://sharvielectronics.com/product/3-7v-1500mah-lithium-polymer-lipo-rechargeable-battery-model-kp-503548/?srsltid=AfmBOopyXjz7G-mfkwz-K-4Pyum_oVMmF9zbMvHpHJ0jdoWNAKr49VVXVOA) $4

1x [Slider Side Power Switch](https://www.digikey.in/en/products/detail/e-switch/EG2315/101778?msclkid=ebc0e80136a31e44595e81308db51dc9&gclid=ebc0e80136a31e44595e81308db51dc9&gclsrc=3p.ds&gad_source=7&gad_campaignid=23202615318) $0.2

3D Printed Case - By Printing Legion
